name: Tronic
overview: A space themed German language text adventure. The ultimate graphic adventure. The earth in the year 2191 AD. After endless turmoil and wars, there has been more than twenty years of peace in the solar system. BTS, a massive, intelligent computer system, has taken complete power over humanity and truly controls everything. BTS, BIOTRONIC SCAN, was created by humans, to serve humanity. BTS takes care of everything about government business, about the weather and even about the well-being of every citizen. But then the catastrophe happens: BTS goes mad and gives humanity an ultimatum, BTS doesn't want to serve any longer longer, but rule and on the ruins of human civilization its own robot society will be built. You are the last TRONIC agent, graduate of a special school, and suitable for such orders. stop BTS before it enslaves humanity! The Time and BTS fight against you! TRONIC is one of the best German graphic adventures for the Commodore 64 on disk. A sentence parser that understands complex sentences, 45 hires pictures of very good quality, sprite control in all pictures, interactivity of main characters, background music and an absolutely variable gameplay guarantee hours of excitement. Nearly 8200 different solutions mean you won't get bored.
